title: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields
description: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields Integration build 09/17. Looks bad on all motif platforms.
OB: The Project Properties Info page is using text fields instead of labels.
EB: The Project Properties Info page should use labels instead of text fields. I guess this is so that their values can be selected and copied by the user.
SR: To reproduce the issue, select a Project, right-click Properties, and go to the subsequent Info page. Observe the readonly fields (the values for Path, Type, etc.).
